resources.string: Enter the following types of words to make a crazy story! Don\'t hit submit until ALL the blanks have been filled in!

Oftentimes it can be hard to choose the right ____________ to visit, but with your ____________ skills it can be made much easier! First, you should ____________ alongside ____________________. After that, you can ask ________________ to go to your favorite restaurant with you to eat ________________. Lastly, the most important step is to visit ______ different ____________ stores!
